definition: remote/hidden away/secluded/serene/peaceful/to imprison/in superstition indicates the underworld/ancient district spanning Liaonang and Hebei provinces

sentences.english: The author summarizes three particular properties of this kind of sentence in syntactic and semantic aspects.
sentences.chinese: 文章分析了花園幽徑句的三個句法語義特性。

sentences.english: We were in the shrubbery at the end of the lime-walk.
sentences.chinese: 我們是在菩提幽徑盡頭的灌木叢林裏。
前往花園幽徑，莫往飛沙大漠。

sentences.english: From time to time such holes light up the path.
sentences.chinese: 時不時有這樣的孔穴給幽徑透點亮光。
